name: Tilt Maze
description:
Tilt Maze is a fast and easy to play maze game. Just tilt your iPhone or iPod Touch to move your marble through the labyrinth to the exit. Try your hand at 20 different, colorful mazes that will test your balance and timing. The game even remembers your best time for each maze so you can keep trying to improve your performance.

To play any of the different levels, just double tap on the maze to bring up the high scores and level selector. Best of all, we don't make you complete one maze before you can play any of the levels straight out of the box.

Built with an advanced physics engine and OpenGL rendering for fast, smooth, realistic gameplay you'll love this little game. No configuration no instructions, no learning curve, just start and go.
